interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Everyday Beauty Glow Day Cream, Gel-to-Oil Rich Moisturizer to Minimize Signs of Aging, Reduce Redness, Dullness, and Fatigue for a Healthy Glow, 1 oz. Jar Review Date: 2022/08/21 Store: Everyday Beauty Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Everyday Beauty', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.52 x 1.93 inches; 4.66 Ounces', 'UPC': '700463002381', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosmetic Solutions, LLC'} Review Text: I really like the feel of gel moisturizers when they go onto my face. There’s something about them that is super absorbent, yet extremely moisturizing. This particular cream/gel is exactly the same way. Did not leave a sticky/greasy feel/look at all on my face, it actually absorbed very quickly. It has a slight fragrant smell, nothing too extreme and it is did not irritate my skin at all. I have very sensitive skin and have to be careful about which products I use. It’s kept my face completely moisturized & glowing throughout the day.
My ONLY Issue with this product is the price. It’s a bit much for something that I need to use twice daily.
DISCLAIMER:
📝Yes, I am a VINE 🗣VOICE member. EVERY product that I review was selected by ME & ONLY ME. The product or item is ALWAYS something that is needed and will be used in my Home🏡 & Yard 🌱🍃, or for my FAMILY 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦& Pets🦮🐾🐈‍⬛, or JUST FOR ME 💁🏻‍♀️. Review Title: It’s more of a GEL moisturizer than a CREAM👍⭐️ Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Focus on gel-based moisturizers for facial skincare. 
- **Skin Type Sensitivity:** Preference for products that are suitable for sensitive skin; avoids anything irritating. 
- **Aesthetic Feel:** Enjoys non-greasy, quick-absorbing formulas that maintain skin hydration and a healthy glow.
- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** Prefers mild scents, particularly those that are not overpowering.
- **Price Sensitivity:** Concerned about product pricing; seeks value for regular usage.
- **Engagement with Products:** Actively participates in reviews as a VINE member; shows a commitment to using and evaluating necessary products for personal and family needs.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Generally enjoys the products but expresses critical feedback regarding cost versus frequent use. 
- **Value for Quality:** Values product effectiveness and experience over just affordability. 

This profile indicates a user who is discerning in selecting skincare products, prioritizes quality and suitability for sensitive skin, and is engaged with the beauty community through sharing their insights.
